title: Shinya Yabusaki
text:
is a former Japanese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Playing career.
Yabusaki was born in <a href="Chiba%20%28city%29">Chiba</a> on June 1, 1978. After graduating from high school, he joined his local club <a href="Kashiwa%20Reysol">Kashiwa Reysol</a> in 1997. However he could not play at all in the match until 1999. On November 18, 2000, he debuted against <a href="Kawasaki%20Frontale">Kawasaki Frontale</a>. However he could hardly play in the match in 6 seasons and retired end of 2002 season.
